title: I am wondering why the DA has not checked into Mr Mott concerning the murder of the girl that was on his property and also Ms. Vannewkirk?  According to the article in the paper it said he had a relationship with Ms. Vannewkirk.  I think they need to broaden their scope.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/05/why-havent-police-checked-into-mott-concerning-the-tucker-and-vannewkirk-cases/
